description: Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission 23/02435 (Construction of single-storey basement extension below footprint of property; demolition of rear single storey flat roof structure; replacement windows at courtyard elevation; replacement of 4 windows and door with french doors; replacement of railings on parapet wall around second floor roof terrace) for the removal of the proposed rear internal staircase and storage facilities at basement and ground floor levels in order to open-up a new external courtyard to serve as a garden, with the addition of a new external staircase to the basement within the new courtyard; changes to the fenestration to the new external courtyard elevations at basement and ground floor levels with the installation of French doors with side-lights, retention of door and two windows on ground floor of existing courtyard elevation; retention of window opening at first floor rear elevation; removal of proposed flat roof element over master bedroom on first floor.Ã¿
